item.description: This is the same dungeon that will be running/ran on july 5th. This is for people who were unable to attend. I tested this dungeon out previously with another group and it didnt get very good reviews. All i have to say is that its very informative about the religions in 3.5 edition. Its a bit of a goose chase, with little action to it. Its still worth standard apl2 xp though! It will only run with 4-6 players. Any less and it cannot be done by rpga rules.
item.name: RPGA APL2 at Disposeable Heroes "Faith No More"
